title: The least frequent daily users of social media
summary: This chart shows the least frequent users of social media by Age Group .
\\n You can see that the least frequent users are in the 35 - 44 and 25 - 34 Age groups .
The most frequent users are in the 45 - 54 Age Group and they use social media twice as much the least frequent users .
gold: The chart shows daily social media usage by age group . social media was used most by ages 45 - 54 at around 130 minutes , followed by ages 15 - 24 at just above 120 minutes . Ages 55 - 64 used social media for around 110 minutes .
